DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 44 patient randomize 3:1 ratio two possible treatment group , pardoprunox pramipexole , respectively . The first part study blind consist minimum 1-week screening period , 4-week switch stabilization period 8-week maintenance period . The second part study open label pardoprunox treatment dose adjustment period 4 week follow long term maintenance treatment .
